title: U.S. Expected to Require Covid-19 Tests for All International Visitors
content:
1. U.S. Expected to Require Covid-19 Tests for All International Visitors  The Wall Street Journal
  2. CDC announces that US will require negative COVID-19 test for all international travelers  Fox News
  3. CDC Requires All Air Passengers Flying To U.S. To Test Negative  CBS New York
  4. U.S. to require negative COVID-19 tests for international air passengers: sources  Reuters
  5. CDC to require all air travelers to US to show negative coronavirus test  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 美国预计将要求所有国际游客进行Covid-19测试。
